HeaderSettings.Title: creator Device Server
HeaderSettings.OAuth20Description: The creator Device Server requires OAuth 2.0 for authenticating all API requests to secure endpoints.

DefaultStatusDescriptions.400: Missing mandatory parameters or failure to deserialise the request body.
DefaultStatusDescriptions.401: An invalid session token was provided in the Http authorization header.
DefaultStatusDescriptions.403: A valid session token was provided, but does not have permissions required to perform the requested operation.
DefaultStatusDescriptions.404: The requested resource does not exist.
DefaultStatusDescriptions.409: A resource already exists that matches the resource requested to be created.

Introduction.Getting Started: Go to https://github.com/Creatordev/DeviceServer for a detailed introduction on how to use this REST API.
Introduction.Using the \"Try it\" feature: On secure endpoints, The OAuth 2.0 security scheme must be selected, with a valid organisation access key/secret pair entered into the username and password fields.

startindex.description: The index of the first element to retrieve.
